record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 641

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding there is a bill at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading and, in order to place this bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
